description:
Small Pride
Bunji and Ma are doing the Unpoko Dance but Chi is the only one who staying back and watching. When Mom asks Chi why he`s not doing it, he ran to the toilet...
Children Are Mirror Images of Parents
Even though they are in elementary school, the fighting never stops, and Mom gets angry at Bunji and Fumi. When Dad walks by, she tells him to do something about it. When he hears about it, he does so reluctantly, and Mom`s anger turns to him.
Honest and Healthy
Today, Mom is at the center of the topic of talking about children. Boys are stupid, yet being honest and healthy is more important. While that opinion has started to dominate, the powerful Mrs. Gonda says something else.
Style
When Mom goes out with her usual clothes, Fumi stops her and tells her that it`s ugly to walk out in such clothes. And Fumi starts to coordinate what to wear, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Small Pride / Children are Mirror Images of Parents / Honest and Healthy / Style
